website_summaries.verdict: Got its seal of approval from the American Podiatric Medical Association, this higher-priced unit gets top marks.
pros: Kills up to 99.9% of bacteria in 45 min
Can help prevent yellow toenails and foot fungus
Claims to be recommended by doctors
cons: to eliminate almost all bacteria might be too long if you're in a hurry

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed at First.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this. Did three pairs of shoes. Then it quit working. The indicator was blinking red for both lamps. So disappointed. I was able to contact TS and they were able to get the unit working properly again. Had to do with too much light in the room. Hopefully everything will be good from now on. Looking forward to having sanitized shoes and getting rid of my toenail fungus.....
customer_reviews.author: Adriane

customer_reviews.title: Works well...really well
customer_reviews.text: I visited an inexpensive nail salon and ended up with a nail fungus. I knew better than to visit one of those but, alas, I was being cheap...and ended up paying for it. As part of my war on my nail fungus I purchased this for my shoes. I used it each time I took my shoes off at the end of the day. I never wear socks and I had one pair of shoes that would rally smell - but they don't smell any longer. This light system took care of that and I think it helped clear up my nail fungus. Hooray for the ultraviolet shoe sanitizer.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these and the left side was broken. It was always red no matter what. Then they sent me another one and this time the right side is broken! It will shine blue for a minute or two then always turns red. Ugh! Its also so finicky with the safety features and doesn’t seem to shine any light at all into the heel region so I don’t see how it could be disinfecting the whole shoe even on the one side that was working. I took a picture to show that the one working side clearly only does the toe.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: Scent pouch covers just fell off and both broke in the same spot. Contacted seller and they were nice enough on the phone but stated this is not a warranty issue and unit should work fine without the sent pouches. A little annoying because why have them then? Poor design !

customer_reviews.title: Better off playing the lotto than trying to get one of these things to work!
customer_reviews.text: This is a picture of me sending not 1, but 2 Useless no good Steri shoes back. Both times when I received the items they were not boxed in shipping box, this might be why they both didn’t work. Both times I received the StriShoe and tried to turn them on they never worked. Even read the troubleshooting instructions. And still Crickets. Don’t waste your time and money with this item. I read the other reviews and was hoping that mine would work, well they didn’t. So they are about as useless as a one legged cat trying to bury a turd on a frozen lake.

customer_reviews.title: It works, some safety feature glitches
customer_reviews.text: This works much better than my other cheaper brand. The safety feature are frustrating though. If the cord is twisted or the ground in not level (live in an old San Francisco bay house), it won't turn on. I by-passed the light sensor that prevented it from turning on by taping dark tape over the sensors. It's to keep you from being blinded from the UV light, but I leave my shoes on a shoe rack and don't hang around that part of the house.

customer_reviews.title: I bought the SteriShoe and haven't been disappointed. It took a couple of days

I bought the SteriShoe and haven't been disappointed. It took a couple of days, but the smell is gone. I have to sterilize my shoes every evening, but that's ok with me as long as I don't have stinky feet! Great product.

product_meta.title: SteriShoe Essential - Ultraviolet Shoe Sanitizer/UV Sneaker Deodorizer/Boot Sterilizer/Kills Toenail Fungus (Onychomycosis)
product_meta.description: Clean your shoes and fight odor-causing bacteria with SteriShoe Ultraviolet Shoe Sanitizer Sweat from your feet can create a damp, smelly foot environment yet you can't wash most shoes. So how can you keep them clean? Sanitize them daily with the SteriShoe sanitizer! One size fits all shoes. Note: The SteriShoe sanitizer will not eliminate fungus that is already on your nails.
feature_bullets: Exclusive UV shoe sanitizing technology protected by over 20 U.S. and international patents. The SteriShoe ultraviolet shoe sanitizer earned a Seal of Acceptance from the American Podiatric Medical Association; a study about its ability to clean shoes was published in the Journal of the American Podiatric Medical Association; and it is recommended by over 1,000 doctors.

Kills up to 99.9% of the germs that cause shoe odor, athletes foot, toenail fungus and warts inside shoes. When preventing or fighting foot infections wearing sanitized shoes is a must, you don't want to step into shoes filled with microorganisms.

Safe: Designed in the USA, the SteriShoe sanitizer uses UVC light to clean the inside of shoes, not chemicals. UVC can burn to the skin and eyes when it is improperly used. To ensure safety and proper use, the SteriShoe sanitizer has safety features that prevent it from turning on when it is not inside a shoe.
Easy to use: Insert it into a shoe, plug it in, turn it on and 45 minutes later the UVC light turns itself off. 24/7 U.S. based customer support if you need assistance.
